page.head: Dental Care
page.body:
If you don't keep your teeth clean, then you can suffer from dental decay.
Dental decay is an infectious disease!
Cavities are caused by acid made by bacteria that dissolves your teeth.
If you get a cavity, it can spread to other teeth and affect the rest of your body.
It's easy to keep your teeth healthy! Brush and floss all 5 surfaces of each tooth to keep them clean.
